Webflow Integration Instructions

  1. Add these scripts to your Webflow site's HEAD section (Project Settings â†’ Custom Code):
    <script crossorigin src="https://unpkg.com/react@18.2.0/umd/react.production.min.js"></script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://unpkg.com/react-dom@18.2.0/umd/react-dom.production.min.js"></script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://unpkg.com/styled-components@5.3.11/dist/styled-components.min.js"></script>
  2. Add an HTML Embed element to your page with the following code:
    <div id="roi-calculator"></div>
    <script src="https://your-vercel-domain.vercel.app/roi-calculator-bundle.js"></script>
